Subskills.name: Consuming Flames
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict shadow burn on hit.

Subskills.name: Arcane Surge
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by shadow bolt.

Subskills.name: Shadow Flame
Subskills.description: Shadow bolt bursts into a shadow nova on hit with increased damage and area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Power of the Dark Side
Subskills.description: Decreases mana cost of shadow bolt.

Subskills.name: Dark Conjurer
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional shadow bolt.

Subskills.name: Taunting Shadows
Subskills.description: Chance to taunt monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Inner Corruption
Subskills.description: Increases the size of shadow bolts.

Subskills.name: Shadows Dispair
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Shadow Cascade
Subskills.description: Shadow bolt has a chance to burst into smaller shadow bolts on hit. This effect can occur infinitely.

Subskills.name: Flames of Corruption
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to shadow burning targets.

Subskills.name: Warlock from the Shadows
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to critically hit with increased critical damage.

Subskills.name: Warlocks Might
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of shadow bolt.

Subskills.name: Shadow Beams
Subskills.description: Unleash beams of shadows towards monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Shadows Grasp
Subskills.description: Unleash a grasping shadow hand pulling monsters towards you inflicting arcane break on hit.
